text: The rolls tasted quite good but there rice was too dry and the nigiris did not have a big enough piece of fish on them. It was cheap but I guess you get what you pay for. I'm pretty picky about the taste of the soy sauce though, and this one was great.

Ce lieu de prédilection pour se faire livrer des sushis, la qualité peut un peu varier selon le chefs (donc selon la journée) mais qui sont toujours savoureux! Le rapport qualité / prix est plus qu'excellant.
I'm not an expert, but I find their Sushi really good, and love the sesame and soy sauce. the prices are reasonable. The owner is always friendly and tries to handle every order as soon as possible.
